text: All Remains to People () is a 1963 Soviet drama movie directed by Georgy Natanson.Всесильная женщинаВсе остается людям It stars Nikolai Cherkasov, Andrei Popov, and Elina Bystritskaya. == Actors == * Nikolai Cherkasov as Fyodor Dronov, academicianKinoPoisk *Sophia Pilyavskaya as Natalia, his wife * Andrei Popov as father Seraphim * Elina Bystritskaya as Ksenia Rumyantseva *Igor Ozerov as Alexey Vyazmin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1963 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Georgy Natanson Category:Movies about scientists Category:Movies based on plays
title: All Remains to People
